markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" />command, envision ([evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103))   **Requirements** The club has at least 1 charge; **Effect** You flip the club around to blast a cone of energy from its base. Each creature in a 15-foot cone takes 1d6 damage per charge stored in the club, with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save against your spell DC or DC 19, whichever is greater. The damage type is the same type the charges were attuned to. The club loses all of its charges.
